releaseNotes: Fixed Settings View Layout and Scrolling - Fixed Settings view layout to prevent About section from being obscured - Restructured Settings view to use proper ScrollView instead of Form - Reset Program button now properly positioned at bottom of scrollable content - Improved Settings view scrolling behavior and content visibility - Enhanced Settings view layout with better spacing and organization - Fixed UI layout issues that were affecting iPhone display - Better user experience with properly accessible About section - Ready for TestFlight distribution with improved Settings view layout
